short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create custom podcasts from URLs and PDFs. Requires accompanying mobile app account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works along side Palate AI Custom Podcasts App. The extension allows you to quickly send URLs or PDFs to Palate while you are browsing the web.

When you send Palate a URL or PDF from Chrome, the app will automatically create an AI generated podcast for you to listen to on the mobile app.

Users must have an existing Palate account to sign in with.
